about_the_game:
If you like Kota`s New Journey and want to support the further development of future KotaMota Games titles, then the Supporter Pack is the way to go!

Access:

After download, you'll find the Supporter Pack in your game's directory folder, accessible through: Kota`s New Journey->Properties->Browse Local Files

You will receive:

  • A set of unique lewd arts with Kota!

  • Cool full HD wallpapers!

  • A pack of extra spicy arts with Mota!

  • Our infinite love!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains non-explicit sex scenes in humorous content. Interaction with penis-like objects, sexualized poses, poses simulating sexual intercourse, partial nudity.
All characters in these scenes are adults.

The DLC contains sketches of the original game, artwork, and wallpapers.
